title: open.mp
description: A multiplayer mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, fully backward-compatible with San Andreas Multiplayer (SA-MP).

title: samp-node
description: A C++ plugin for San Andreas Multiplayer that embeds Node.js into the server, allowing scripting with JavaScript/TypeScript across multiple isolated environments.

title: small3d-cpp
description: A minimalistic 3D renderer written in C++, focused on simplicity and core rendering logic.

title: open.mp Website
description: The official website for open.mp, live at https://open.mp/. Iâ€™ve contributed extensively to its development using Golang for the backend and React with TypeScript for the frontend.

title: open.mp Launcher
description: A cross-platform launcher for open.mp that lets players browse and join servers. Built with Rust and React/React Native using TypeScript.

title: omp-models
description: A web-based 3D model viewer using Next.js, React Native Web, and Three.js. It renders optimized game models stored in compact JSON format.

title: rwexporter
description: A CLI tool that extracts DFF/TXD model data from GTA: San Andreas and converts it into optimized JSON or binary formats.

title: FarsiType
description: A lightweight C++ library for handling Farsi/Arabic strings, including shaping and rendering support.
